underlying_goal: To update a slide deck (`week-19.md`) with new 'difficulty-correlation detection results'.
friction_detail: The agent had a minor issue when appending content to the main slides file, possibly due to a missing newline, and had to retry the operation.
primary_success: Not only adding the new results as new slides, but also proactively and correctly updating the Agenda, Summary, and Narrative slides to ensure the new findings were consistently integrated throughout the presentation.
brief_summary: The user provided new research results and asked to update a Slidev presentation. After a minor file-writing hiccup, Claude successfully added five new slides with the detailed results. It also proactively updated the agenda and multiple summary slides to ensure the new findings were consistently reflected throughout the entire presentation.
